## Reference proteome sequence
```{r reference}
# MAIN PROTEIN FEATURES
SGD  = load.sgd.features()
UNIPROT = load.uniprot.features() # Takes >60sec
saveRDS(UNIPROT,"data/uniprot-features.rds")


# PRIMARY REFERENCE SEQUENCES
S288C  = load.sgd.proteome(withORF=F)
UNI.SC = load.uniprot.proteome('yeast')
id_sgd = names(S288C)
sgduni = get.mapping.sgd.to.uniprot(input = id_sgd)
head(sgduni)

width(S288C)
width(UNI.SC)
```
